FuncDef: This command provides a mechanism to configure the PIR for the congestion override policer. It is recommended that the PIR is configured larger than twice the maximum MTU for the traffic handled by the policer to allow for some burstiness of the traffic.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer value defining size, in kbytes, for the PIR of thepolicer. Values-0 to 100000000.
